      • addMethodListener

        public static boolean addMethodListener(java.lang.String type,
                        javax.swing.JComponent widget,
                        java.lang.String value)
        Facilitates adding of event listeners to XML Widgets.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of event listener to add
        widget - The widget to bind the listener to.
        value - The function to be evaluated by JavaScript.
        engine - The JavaScript engine.
        Returns:
        True on success, False on failure.
